name: Flippy Flip
description:
Flippy Flip is a games about flipping cards. Start with memorise the first card numbers, then calculate the sequence for the card number. After the card move into the correct place, TAP to flip the next card number. Flip the final smile card to move into the next level.

Features
- Memorise, calculate, timing & reflexes
- Unlock different card back
- Game Center leaderboard
- Unlimited level
- Colourful design

Thanks for playing
